page.title: 14 CASTLE CARY TODAY
page.content: Castle Cary is positioned in a valley surrounded by hills.It is a smallwn in Somerset.For the size of the town there are many cars,buses and lorries passing through. In the town are antique shops,book shops,hotels and general stores.There are a few businesses,tradeshops and small bakeries.There is a war memorial at the end of Fore Street.The library is roughly opposite the Bailey.It is a very useful place to find out information on Castle Cary,old and new. The High Street is crammed full of shops and houses.There is a museum in the town,about which there is more information in the project.There is a River Cary running through the town, The population of Castle Cary is in the region of 1500,a small but thriving and attractive settlement.
